mapper.insert: insert into cart (user_id, p_id, cart_amount) values (#{uid}, #{pid}, #{camount})
mapper.select: select c.user_id, c.p_id, p.p_name, p.p_price, c.cart_amount, photos.photo_id, photos.photo_oname, photos.photo_sname, photos.photo_type, photos.photo_role from cart c, products p, photos where c.user_id = #{uid} and c.p_id = p.p_id and p.p_id = photos.p_id and photos.photo_role = 'main'
mapper.update: update cart set cart_amount = cart_amount+1 where user_id=#{uid} and p_id=#{pid}
update cart set cart_amount = cart_amount-1 where user_id=#{uid} and p_id=#{pid}
